fields.Title of Contribution (if applicable): Radio Free Europe Radio Liberty Website
fields.Description/Abstract:
An article on the Radio Free Europe Radio Liberty website, titled “Once Known as Preeminent Soviet Scholar, Stephen Cohen Now Seen as Putin Apologist,” included a comment from Lynn Lubamersky. The article was critical of Cohen’s defense of Putin’s actions in Crimea.
http://www.rferl.org/content/stephen-cohen-us-scholar-controversial-putin-apologist/26997584.html
